protocol_name: CviRI Purification From XZ-6E Virus Infected NC64A Chlorella
protocol_name_html: CviRI Purification From XZ-6E Virus Infected NC64A Chlorella
before_start: 3-4 hour XZ-6E virus infected NC64A, pellets frozen at -80°C
guidelines:
MATERIALS AND ASSAY CONDITIONS:

1) 3-4 hour XZ-6E virus infected NC64A, pellets frozen at -80°C
2) Buffer A:
  • 10 mM Tris-HCl, pH 8.0
  • 10 mM 2-ME
  • 50 µg/mL PMSF
3) Buffer B:
  • 20 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.8
  • 0.5 mM EDTA
  • 7 mM 2-ME, 10% Glycerol
4) Buffer C:
  • 10 mM KHPO4, pH 7.4
  • 0.5 mM EDTA
  • 7 mM 2-ME, 10% Glycerol
5) Storage buffer:
  • 20 mM Tris-HCl, pH 8.0
  • 0.5 mM EDTA
  • 0.1 mM DTT
  • 50 mM KCl
  • 5 mM MgCl2, 50% Glycerol
6) 4 M NaCl
7) 28% Polyethyleneglycol (PEG) 8000
8) Assay buffer and conditions:
       1X CviRI assay buffer:
  • 10 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.8
  • 150 mM KCl
  • 10 mM MgCl2
  • 100 µg/mL BSA

All assays are carried out in 20.0 µL volumes with 1 µg of pUC19 DNA as substrate for 60 to120 min at 25°C. The assays are electrophoresed on 1.2% agarose gels (100 mL gels with double 20 lane combs) for 1 hour at 100 volts in 1X TPE buffer. Gels are stained with 0.5 µg/mL ethidium bromide for 30 min and visualized and photographed on a UV light box.

For use in CviRI Purification From XZ-6E Virus Infected NC64A Chlorella.

components.data: 10 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.8
components.name: Description

source_data.description: 10 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.8

components.data: 150 mM KCl
components.name: Description

source_data.description: 150 mM KCl

components.data: 10 mM MgCl<sub>2</sub>
components.name: Description

source_data.description: 10 mM MgCl<sub>2</sub>

components.data: 100 µg/mL BSA
components.name: Description

source_data.description: 100 µg/mL BSA

components.data: Thaw the 3-4 hour XZ-6E virus-infected NC64A chlorella and suspend in MSK flasks with Buffer A. Suspend with 20 mL per flask per 1.0-1.5 X 1011 infected cells.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Thaw the 3-4 hour XZ-6E virus-infected NC64A chlorella and suspend in MSK flasks with Buffer A. Suspend with 20 mL per flask per 1.0-1.5 X 1011 infected cells.

components.data: Homogenize the cells in the MSK mechanical homogenizer with 15 gm of 0.3 mm glass beads at 4,000 rpm for 90 sec (2 X 45 sec) with CO<sub>2</sub> cooling.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Homogenize the cells in the MSK mechanical homogenizer with 15 gm of 0.3 mm glass beads at 4,000 rpm for 90 sec (2 X 45 sec) with CO<sub>2</sub> cooling.

components.data: Recover the homogenate to clean tubes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Recover the homogenate to clean tubes.

components.data: Adjust the homogenate supernatant to 70% saturation with (NH4)2SO4 at 4°C with gentle stirring. Add the (NH4)2SO4 gradually.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Adjust the homogenate supernatant to 70% saturation with (NH4)2SO4 at 4°C with gentle stirring. Add the (NH4)2SO4 gradually.

components.data: Centrifuge the material in the Sorvall SS34 rotor at 10,000 rpm, 10 min, 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge the material in the Sorvall SS34 rotor at 10,000 rpm, 10 min, 4°C.

components.data: Suspend the pellets with Buffer A.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Suspend the pellets with Buffer A.

components.data: Centrifuge the material in the Sorvall SS34 rotor at 10,000 rpm, 10 min, 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge the material in the Sorvall SS34 rotor at 10,000 rpm, 10 min, 4°C.

components.data: Dilute the supernatant with 3-5 volumes of Buffer B to reduce the NaCl concentration.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dilute the supernatant with 3-5 volumes of Buffer B to reduce the NaCl concentration.

components.data: Elute the Heparin-Sepharose column with Buffer B using a 0.2-1.2 M NaCl gradient.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Elute the Heparin-Sepharose column with Buffer B using a 0.2-1.2 M NaCl gradient.

components.data: Elute the Blue-Sepharose column (or Affi-Gel-Blue column) with Buffer B using a 0.2-2.0 M KOAc gradient.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Elute the Blue-Sepharose column (or Affi-Gel-Blue column) with Buffer B using a 0.2-2.0 M KOAc gradient.

components.data: Dilute the pooled fractions with 2 volumes of Buffer C to reduce the salt concentration.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dilute the pooled fractions with 2 volumes of Buffer C to reduce the salt concentration.

components.data: Elute the Hydroxylapatite column with Buffer C using a 0-1.0 M KHPO<sub>4</sub> gradient.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Elute the Hydroxylapatite column with Buffer C using a 0-1.0 M KHPO<sub>4</sub> gradient.

components.data: Dilute the pooled fractions with 3-4 volumes of Buffer B.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dilute the pooled fractions with 3-4 volumes of Buffer B.

components.data: Concentrate the pooled enzyme by dialysis overnight into storage buffer at 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Concentrate the pooled enzyme by dialysis overnight into storage buffer at 4°C.

components.data: Wash the glass beads 3X with 5 mL of Buffer A and combine with the homogenate.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash the glass beads 3X with 5 mL of Buffer A and combine with the homogenate.

components.data: Centrifuge the homogenate in the Sorvall SS34 rotor at 10,000 rpm,20 min, 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge the homogenate in the Sorvall SS34 rotor at 10,000 rpm,20 min, 4°C.

components.data: Save the supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Save the supernatant.

components.data: Incubate at 4°C for 60-90 min without stirring.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate at 4°C for 60-90 min without stirring.

components.data: Save the pellet.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Save the pellet.

components.data: Per mL of suspension add: 0.45 mL of 4 M NaCl and 0.45 mL of 28% PEG 8000 (heated to 65°C).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Per mL of suspension add: 0.45 mL of 4 M NaCl and 0.45 mL of 28% PEG 8000 (heated to 65°C).

components.data: Mix gently by inversion for 5-10 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Mix gently by inversion for 5-10 min.

components.data: Save the supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Save the supernatant.

source_data.annotation: If there is small particulate matter in the supernatant, centrifuge a second time as before and save the supernatant.
source_data.thread_text: If there is small particulate matter in the supernatant, centrifuge a second time as before and save the supernatant.
source_data.body: If there is small particulate matter in the supernatant, centrifuge a second time as before and save the supernatant.

components.data: Load the material overnight onto a small Heparin-Sepharose column equilibrated with Buffer B.

components.data: Elute the column with Buffer B containing 2.0 M NaCl.
components.name: Description

components.data: Collect small fractions (approximately 35 drops per fraction).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Collect small fractions (approximately 35 drops per fraction).

components.data: Assay the column fractions (only about the first 10-15 fractions) and pool the active fractions.
components.name: Description
